mapper.select: select t.*, t1.task_name, t1.work_group_id, t4.group_name as workGroupName, t2.no, t2.title, t2.type, t2.safe_notice, t2.outsource, t2.important, t2.method, t2.quality_level, t2.asset_type_id, t2.work_time, t2.requirement, t2.must_replace, t2.measure, t3.name AS assetTypeName from bu_tp_repair_plan_regu_info t left join bu_tp_repair_plan_task t1 on t1.id = t.task_id left join bu_repair_regu_detail t2 on t2.id = t.regu_detail_id left join bu_train_asset_type t3 on t3.id = t2.asset_type_id left join bu_mtr_workshop_group t4 on t4.id = t1.work_group_id where t1.plan_id = #{planId} order by t1.work_group_id, t.regu_id, t2.no

select t.*, t2.no, t2.title, t2.type, t2.safe_notice, t2.outsource, t2.important, t2.method, t2.quality_level, t2.asset_type_id, t2.work_time, t2.requirement, t2.must_replace, t2.measure, t3.name AS assetTypeName from bu_tp_repair_plan_regu_info t left join bu_tp_repair_plan_task t1 on t1.id = t.task_id left join bu_repair_regu_detail t2 on t2.id = t.regu_detail_id left join bu_train_asset_type t3 on t3.id = t2.asset_type_id where t.task_id = #{taskId} order by t.regu_id, t2.no
